授業目的: The course introduces students to advanced research on migration to Japan focusing on Chinese migrants.
到達目標: After taking this course, students will gain a good general understanding of advanced research on Chinese migration to Japan.
授業方法: Class discussion, weekly essay. Zoom lessons for students who have received special permission.

トピック.授業計画1: To be determined in consultation with students.
トピック.授業外学習2: To be determined in consultation with students.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 定期試験に代わるリポート／Term paper to replace the final examination (02)

name: 【670】Japan and Immigration／Japan and Immigration
担当者: ツー　ティモシー（TSU TIMOTHY YUN HUI）
